GMCM_Stairs_Description: The distance of the stairs from the top left corner of the farmhouse. Requires save reload to take effect.
GMCM_FloorNames_Description: The floors to use from bottom to top, case-insensitive. Requires game reload to take effect. The floors you have installed are: {{allOptions}}
GMCM_ActiveFloors: The floors currently in use are: {{activeFloors}}. If anything is missing, be sure to check your spelling and reload the game.
